abstract: Starwood Hotels & Resorts has introduced a slate of rewards for foodies who are members of its loyalty program. As part of a foray into culinary awards, the Starwood Preferred Guest program is offering the chance to bid on rewards like a sushi-making class with the chef Masaharu Morimoto or dinner with Thomas Keller at Per Se.

headline.main: Starwood Rewards Offer: Bidding for Foodies
